element.definition: Points to the value set or external definition (e.g. implicit value set) that identifies the set of codes to be used.
element.comments: For value sets with a referenceResource, the display can contain the value set description.  The reference may be version-specific or not.

constraint.human: URI SHALL start with http:// or https://

mapping.map: points to explicit list or expression that evaluates to list of (Enumerated_Value_Domain).member
